00019 #include <inter/dihedral/CosineDihedral.h>

00021 namespace DdMd
00022 {
00023 
00024    using namespace Inter;
00025 
00029    DihedralFactory::DihedralFactory(Simulation& simulation)
00030     : Factory<DihedralPotential>(),
00031       simulationPtr_(&simulation)
00032    {}
00033 
00034    /*
00035    * Return a pointer to a new DihedralPotential, if possible.
00036    */
00037    DihedralPotential* 
00038    DihedralFactory::factory(const std::string& name) const
00039    {
00040       DihedralPotential* ptr = 0;
00041 
00042       // Try subfactories first.
00043       ptr = trySubfactories(name);
00044       if (ptr) return ptr;
00045 
00046       if (name == "CosineDihedral") {
00047          ptr = new DihedralPotentialImpl<CosineDihedral>(*simulationPtr_);
00048       } //else
00049       return ptr;
00050 
00051    }
00052 
00053 }
00054 #endif
